verbose_text: In the case that glucose and TGs accumulate and the CCAAT / enhancer binding protein (C/EBP)-beta or -delta is induced during early adipocyte differentiation, the activation of C/EBP-alpha, a peroxisome proliferator activated receptor (PPAR) transcription factor, occurs late in differentiation, in turn causing the transcriptional activation of various adipocyte specific mRNAs encoding fatty acid synthase (FAS), lipoprotein lipase (LPL), acetyl-CoA carboxylase (ACC), stearoyl-CoA desaturase-1 (SCD-1) and PPAR co-activator-1 (PGC-1).
evidence: activation of C/EBP-alpha, a peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor
